title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body:
this is really bad. Too many busted as hell teams and you cant ban them out.

Why not just have normal URF.
If you want it to be less of the same bans and champs then every 24 hours of game mode perma ban the top 3 most banned champs

You are better off to have 6 bans then generate a random champ out of hte ones left. Old urf was broken af because you did what you wanted and if there was more than 6 op champs then you had to get in and be better than the enemy. Now that its random it allows you to experience the op champs in some games and have other times have even games.{{champion:238}}

The problem with adding bans to ARURF is that all they have done is swapped URF from using the Draft Pick system to using the ARAM system. Adding bans to ARURF requires them completely rebuilding the system to make it account for bans first and then generate the champions. 

And there is no point doing that when they can use already existing systems
There are many points to redo the system, Riot's just cheap.
The problem there is more than 6 of those champions exist, so you can still end up against something disgusting, regardless of bans.
i just wanna play {{champion:72}} jg urf again
I just don't want to have to pretend like I'm fighting  {{champion:238}} when really all I'm doing is waiting to die.

sometimes if your lucky you can deal with him, when i luck into Shen for example. Half tank half AS/OnHit and spam qwe and he cant do jack between taunt and auto block while you beat him to death with q percent health
Exactly, it's nothing but luck. ARURF does have its highlights, but they're all overshadowed by the inability to ban out the obviously OP champs that make the game a cancerous mess.

i say we keep ARURF but we are allowed to ban who we dont want to vs this would make something like shaco or zed banned if we dont want to vs them but there is still enough people the are stong in urf that it wont be as boring
pls riot add bans to ARURF

I can handle the AR but come on  

ARURF is now available now available for these times:
Friday: 11:00am - 3:00am AEST
Saturday: 11:00am - 3:00am AEST
Sunday 11:00am - 3:00am AEST
Monday 11:00am - 3:00am AEST

Wat the hell is this rubbish?
limiting when people can play thats just stupid imo
The servers have to have downtime for maintenance and these times are when the population isn't on. be happy were getting it at all unlike other developers who don't care about their community.
I call crap on that. 8 hours for "server maintentance", is this 1997 and nobody told me? And as for nobody playing in the mornings on a weekend? Riiiiiiight..
its not limiting it lol not really, if you actually read the posts they make you'd know that urf made the highest drop off rate out off all the other game modes so it makes it more playable

the problem with aram is this

is punishes people for owning lots of champions and doesn't punish people who own like 2 and will constantly get those champs

i own every single bloody champ and is one of the reasons i never play aram.

do i play 90% of the champs i own fuck no do i want to play 90% of the champs in urf fuck no i have waited fucking 6 months for a game mode that i thought would be a monthly thing.

Riot have really lost touch with the community in my opinion i have had a riot employer actually reply and use my advice to a patch at a later date.

you don't get this type of service anymore and it's really disgusting really.
Make an alt and buy only your main(s)
This is so dissapointing. All i've been having are disgusting one sided matches. There hasn't been a single good game yet.

im alright with whatever Riot offers us at this stage. Still way better than nothing.
I play URF for fun. If I can win then It is good if not , does not matter that much as long as I have some funs. This is way better than another crappy game modes. I wish I have shaco / zed over and over again  ( as I did on standard URF ) but with ARURF I can try different champs which I do not play on standard URF and hell yeah, a lot more fun.
Guys, just relax and enjoy 3 days of  URF and hope we do not need to wait that long before it comes back to queue again.
GL HF

can you have this as the next ARURF if there is

there is 3 bans and after all get picked a random champion

"_ARURF is now available now available for these times_"
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Was looking forward to URF for so long, but this was just the biggest let down. C'mon riot. :\ {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Its hard to say anything other than Random URF really sucks, it suffers from the same problem ARAM has and thats which ever team gets the OP champs win.

Atleast with normal URF if certin champs were nor banned, like Zed and Leblanc, you can counter pick or play around it because you KNOW someone is gonna pick them, with All random your just plain screwed when you come up against them.
Please Riot change it back to normal.

I like how riot have tried to address these constant 'op' picks, but tbh having random picks is just not URF, you still do see these op picks and it almost ruins URF because you dont get to play the chaamps you like and enjoy... so yeah nice idea riot but just bring back the old URF before its ruined completely... Thanks.
RIOT, HOW ABOUT HAVING ARURF, and URF BOTH OPEN AT THE SAME TIME, TO SATISFY EVERYONE{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} {{summoner:3}}
they made it random so basically people dont just spam the same champs or champs that are op in urf so its a bit more of a fair game mode. Complaining in caps won't help your situation either.

People played what they wanted. In many cases everyone had an op champ. So since everyone was OP everyone was on the same level, it was fair and everyone played what the wanted to play. Even losing was still fun. Now, even when you're winning it's still bad.
i played arurf, the same champs were seen every game
Shit game mode. I am dissappointed

I think the random aspect takes a lot of the fun out of it, since the whole point of URF is to pick the most OP champ you can get and just have fun with it. ARURF means you'll get stuck with champs you don't enjoy or can't play, which ends up with teammates getting salty because people don't know how to play every champ they own.

Really?, i actually like all random urf, coz of that curiousity of who you're gonna play makes me excited and just wanting to spam those abilities is awesome, so i think mixing AR URF is awesome {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
#BRINGBACK(URF)
ARURF is a fail
I got an s on a level 6 mastery champ but I didnt get token
you dont get tokens on rotating game modes or aram.

Does Riot even bother to listen to the community? WE DIDNT WANT THIS!. Yes i know URF was a little annoying with people picking the OP champs but there is way better ways to go around the problem like many people have suggested in the comments section. Furthermore who cares if people use Zed all the time.. WE WANTED URF! Weve been asking for this mode to be permanent or atleast in customs for years but this company is to stupid to bother with that. Riot already stole the ability to play hide and seek from us without asking and ive had enough. 

Im sorry but we need some better game designers in Riot, someone who will actually listen. League of Legends was once a great game but poor design choices and not fixing them have bred a toxic community and repetitive game play.   Just go to Surrender@20 and look at all the posts weekly and see how many champs get nerfed/buffed or edited in some kind of way. Every week without fail there is always pending changes for a champ and for a game thats been out for years thats just sad that they cant find the middle ground. Just give us normal URF and bring back Crystal Scar for customs! i want my hide and seek back.
Personally, I really like arurf...

Riot's on meth again.. bans teemo in OFA but not the many broken, unkillable champs in URF. Also i find it pretty pathetic that a company that pulls in the kind of money it does wont keep the servers open all weekend.. who want to wait till 11am to get the games going, when the queue times are 30 seconds at worst, you can tell people want to play. Get your fingers out of your ears and start listening to your users. And i'll never stop saying this. GIVE US SOME NEW MAPS!!

-edit, i should probably add how making URF AR has made this mode and it's players 10x more toxic than it was before, people have no say over what champ they get, upping the chances that they will just troll for 15 mins til the game is over.

"too many people just picking the op champions"
Now as soon as one team has one and the other doesn't game becomes so snowbally and one sided it's just frustrating and boring. The games balanced with everyone picking this "op champs". Now it's so heavily unfair and just dreadful for the losing team. 
This game mode is by far the worst out of all the RGMs

URF = GOOD  ARURF = BETTER 
"Dodge penalty  20 minutes,." = BEST . GET REKT

Yeah no. I wanted URF. ARURF isn't even fun. It takes the "random OP" team comps of ARAM and then multiplies that x1000. In ARAM its fine. In ARURF, it sure as hell isn't.

Rito Pls. Don't try to "fix" URF. It's fine as it was. Or up the bans to 5 if you want more diversity in champion selection.

when is the new urf coming ;(
{{item:3070}}
Let us play URF on Custom games, with no randoming... Please?
Why can't we do custom URF anymore? I love being able to 1v1 or 2v2 with my friends on URF...
{{champion:120}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:69}} Easy Game {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
so will urf be in the rotation now?
In urf mode you will break your keyboard :p spam and spam XD
{{champion:103}}
